quality_of_application_what_to_improve: To be successful you must pick more recent professional referees.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: Unfortunately your referees and the references they have provided are inadequate. At least one reference must be from your most recent employer. From what I understand the first referee taught you over 20 years ago and second referee is from the school you attended nearly 30 years ago.
qualifications_other_reason_details: Your degree is not relevant to the subject you have applied for. You do not have the required A Level of grade C or above, only an AS level which was obtained nearly 30 years ago.
